text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: That night……『I』 was……

Obviously, there were several different people that would be 
able to unlock the door to the roof. Right, for example――

If it was a "Trainer", we all could. Just like I did on that 
night, any trainer could ask the night staff for a key.
Maybe, on that night, Neo Universe was……
choice_data_list: Were you with a different trainer?
Were you with a different trainer?

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text:
…………………… 
――Recalling.

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: Recalling. "Day X's"――"Communication" record.

text_block_list.name: A Certain Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Neo Universe, thanks for coming. 
The thing I wanted to talk to you about was……

text_block_list.name: A Certain Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Regarding our formal trainer contract. 
As I thought……I think it's better if we don't enter in to one.

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text:
…………………… "Deinstantiation"……is the recommendation? 
Is that because……『Speed』 is insufficient?

text_block_list.name: A Certain Trainer
text_block_list.text:
No, I recognize that you have talent. The first time I saw 
you run, I thought, this girl could go to the 『Japan Derby』!

text_block_list.name: A Certain Trainer
text_block_list.text:
But, I can't communicate well with you. What you're saying, 
how you're feeling, honestly, I don't understand……

text_block_list.name: A Certain Trainer
text_block_list.text:
And you see…… before you, 
there was another Uma Musume who offered to contract with me.

text_block_list.name: A Certain Trainer
text_block_list.text:
I want to fulfill my obligation to her. 
That's why, if I have to choose between the two……

text_block_list.name: A Certain Trainer
text_block_list.text:
I'm sorry, really. I can't become your 
trainer but, I still pray for your success.

To summarize what happened with Neo Universe, another 
trainer had called her here to refuse her contract. However……

That mysterious sound that came from the rooftop. 
Just what was that sound?

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text:
That 『UFO』……sound…… 
Maybe, it was……this……?

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text:
It's from Neo Universe's 『Favorite』 song. 
When I hear it――

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text:
It repairs the "Discontinuity"……it resonates 
within, and puts me at 『Peace』.

Her favorite song's Intro……So, when listening 
to this music, the discontinuity……in other 
words, the sorrow in her heart, is soothed.

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: Neo Universe――desired a connection……desired to 『Run』.

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text:
The words were "CUTT" but――by running, we could "Connect". 
And because……others would feel that too……

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text:
Neo Universe wanted to "Seek" it…… 
But……"STDA"……

――The words were spoken solemnly. I could somehow…… 
understand that. After spending so much time 
together, I could understand her better.

Neo Universe was not some mysterious lifeform. She was 
an Uma Musume that sought to connect with others by 
running, aiming for something beyond that. But she……

Was cut off at the first hurdle, just because 
it was too hard to communicate. That was probably 
the kind of unfortunate Uma Musume she was……

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text:
――Affirmative. 
Without a……"Trajectory". I won't be seen……

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text:
Neo Universe doesn't…… 
want to return to "Default"……

I don't know what lies in store for this girl as she 
continues forward. Would she find meaning? However――

She desired to reach out. Just that alone was enough. 
With just that, she would create that "connection".

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: Help……?

I held my hand out infront of me. I was sure it was a hand 
sign common to all countries, no, the entire universe……

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: ……"Connect"?

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text:
A Copernican……Revolution…… 
The "ASEM" becomes "LAMD"……Becoming the light……

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: ……Sufira. It's very……Sufira, isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: ――Sufira!

I didn't understand the concept behind that word. 
But Neo Universe's……

Faint smile conveyed her intentions. 
"I'd welcome 『You』".

And so, I formally signed a trainer 
contract with Neo Universe――

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: Huuu……!!

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, Neo Universe is 『Reporting In』. 
From ignition……it's a "Rising Curve".

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Hey……isn't there something weird about those two? 
Why is it that their conversation seems to make sense?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
No idea…… But Neo Universe seems to be a nicer girl than 
I thought. I guess my image of her has changed a bit.

It seems like the misunderstandings are starting to 
clear up. Right, Neo Universe was not some mysterious 
lifeform, she was just a slightly eccentric Uma Musume.
From now on, for the same dream, we'd be――

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Good work! Trainer-san, Uni……-san?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Weren't you with Uni-san just now? 
I could have sworn she was just here……

We should have been together…… But, Neo Universe 
was nowhere in sight…… Maybe we couldn't rule out 
that she was a mysterious lifeform after all……

text_block_list.name: Narrator
text_block_list.text:
In this vast universe――there exist inexplicable lifeforms. 
Lifeforms that we cannot perceive.

text_block_list.name: Narrator
text_block_list.text:
An intelligent traveler had just descended, 
and no one yet knew what it would bring to this planet.
